response.overview: Learn Spanish phrases useful for conversing with others with this 2-DVD set. Join Liam and Emma as they meet, get to know each other, and go on a first date. Learn greetings, conversation starters, words and phrases for dining, and much more in fun settings with intriguing plots. English is followed by Spanish which can be easier for most learners than total immersion. Native Spanish speakers clearly enunciate each phrase. Try to say the Spanish expressions before or along with the characters. For extra practice, this video switches genders using another animated couple, Ava and Logan. Whether just starting Spanish or at an intermediate level, this DVD set provides practice for having Spanish conversations in real life situations. Ages 13 & up. Approx. 2.5 hrs
response.title: Rock 'N Learn: Conversational Spanish
